title: Tian Guan Ci Fu (Heaven Official's Blessing)
synopsis: The heavens shake, the thunder rumbles, and Xie Lian appears with an apologetic smileâ€”again! Eight hundred years prior, he was a beloved martial god, known as the Crown Prince of Xianle.
